amendment.description: Amendment strikes all after the enacting clause and inserts a complete new text.
amendment.purpose: Amendment in the nature of a substitute.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Goodlatte amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Goodlatte.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Goodlatte amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Goodlatte amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Goodlatte.
